com.n9mtq4.botclient

Class ControllableBot

  • com.n9mtq4.botclient.ControllableBot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorldObject

    public class ControllableBot
implements WorldObject

    A bot that you can control. These are received when you call game.waitForTurn Not technically a part of the world.

    Created by will on 11/24/15 at 3:16 PM.

    • Nested Class Summary

        A bot that you can control. These are received when you call game.waitForTurn Not technically a part of the world.

        Created by will on 11/24/15 at 3:16 PM.

        Parameters:
        health - the health of the bot
        vision - an array of what the bot can see

      • isBot

        public boolean isBot()

        Returns true if the world object is a bot.

        NOTE: this will return false on a class ControllableBot.

        See Also:
        class ControllableBot

      • isControllableBot

        public boolean isControllableBot()
        Deprecated. 

        Returns true if this world object is a class ControllableBot.

        See Also:
        class ControllableBot

      • isObstacle

        public boolean isObstacle()

        Returns true if the world object is a block or a wall. If you want just a block or just a wall, use WorldObject.isBlock or WorldObject.isWall, respectively.

        See Also:
        WorldObject.isBlock, WorldObject.isWall, WorldObject.isBlock, WorldObject.isWall

      • isFlag

        public boolean isFlag()

        Returns true if this world object is a flag, false otherwise

      • isBlock

        public boolean isBlock()

        Returns true if this world object is a block. Will return false if it is a bot, flag or WALL.

        (it is the opposite of WorldObject.isWall)

        See Also:
        WorldObject.isWall

      • isWall

        public boolean isWall()

        Returns true if the object is a wall Will return false if the obstacle is a block. (even though a wall is a block)
